message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $100. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but that's a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $85?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product!
I understand you're looking for a higher price, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more like $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. Can you consider it?
